description: Non material amendment to planning application 2014/0871 dated 26 August 2014 (for demolition of existing buildings and structures. Erection of two new buildings of  58 storeys (up to 200m above ground) and 43 storeys (up to 161m above ground) high to provide up to 491 residential units, retail uses (classes A1-A4); office space (class B1); a hotel (class C1) together with a high level viewing space; provision of private and public open spaces; vehicular access and reconfigured vehicular access routes; provision of cycle, motorcycle and car parking, servicing and energy centre within the two level basement; landscaping; excavation works; and other associated works) to allow internal changes to affordable housing units at levels 1-6 of the City Tower increasing the number of affordable units from 52 to 57.
